00022 class btTypedConstraint;
00023 class btActionInterface;

00029 typedef void (*btInternalTickCallback)(btDynamicsWorld *world, btScalar timeStep);
00030 
00031 enum btDynamicsWorldType
00032 {
00033         BT_SIMPLE_DYNAMICS_WORLD=1,
00034         BT_DISCRETE_DYNAMICS_WORLD=2,
00035         BT_CONTINUOUS_DYNAMICS_WORLD=3,
00036         BT_SOFT_RIGID_DYNAMICS_WORLD=4,
00037         BT_GPU_DYNAMICS_WORLD=5,
00038     BT_SOFT_MULTIBODY_DYNAMICS_WORLD=6
00039 };
00040 
00042 class btDynamicsWorld : public btCollisionWorld
00043 {
00044 
00045 protected:
00046                 btInternalTickCallback m_internalTickCallback;
00047                 btInternalTickCallback m_internalPreTickCallback;
00048                 void*   m_worldUserInfo;
00049 
00050                 btContactSolverInfo     m_solverInfo;
00051 
00052 public:
00053                 
00054 
00055                 btDynamicsWorld(btDispatcher* dispatcher,btBroadphaseInterface* broadphase,btCollisionConfiguration* collisionConfiguration)
00056                 :btCollisionWorld(dispatcher,broadphase,collisionConfiguration), m_internalTickCallback(0),m_internalPreTickCallback(0), m_worldUserInfo(0)
00057                 {
00058                 }
00059 
00060                 virtual ~btDynamicsWorld()
00061                 {
00062                 }
00063                 
00068                 virtual int             stepSimulation( btScalar timeStep,int maxSubSteps=1, btScalar fixedTimeStep=btScalar(1.)/btScalar(60.))=0;
00069                         
00070                 virtual void    debugDrawWorld() = 0;
00071                                 
00072                 virtual void    addConstraint(btTypedConstraint* constraint, bool disableCollisionsBetweenLinkedBodies=false) 
00073                 { 
00074                         (void)constraint; (void)disableCollisionsBetweenLinkedBodies;
00075                 }
00076 
00077                 virtual void    removeConstraint(btTypedConstraint* constraint) {(void)constraint;}
00078 
00079                 virtual void    addAction(btActionInterface* action) = 0;
00080 
00081                 virtual void    removeAction(btActionInterface* action) = 0;
00082 
00083                 //once a rigidbody is added to the dynamics world, it will get this gravity assigned
00084                 //existing rigidbodies in the world get gravity assigned too, during this method
00085                 virtual void    setGravity(const btVector3& gravity) = 0;
00086                 virtual btVector3 getGravity () const = 0;
00087 
00088                 virtual void    synchronizeMotionStates() = 0;
00089 
00090                 virtual void    addRigidBody(btRigidBody* body) = 0;
00091 
00092                 virtual void    addRigidBody(btRigidBody* body, int group, int mask) = 0;
00093 
00094                 virtual void    removeRigidBody(btRigidBody* body) = 0;
00095 
00096                 virtual void    setConstraintSolver(btConstraintSolver* solver) = 0;
00097 
00098                 virtual btConstraintSolver* getConstraintSolver() = 0;
00099                 
00100                 virtual int             getNumConstraints() const {     return 0;               }
00101                 
00102                 virtual btTypedConstraint* getConstraint(int index)             {       (void)index;            return 0;               }
00103                 
00104                 virtual const btTypedConstraint* getConstraint(int index) const {       (void)index;    return 0;       }
00105 
00106                 virtual btDynamicsWorldType     getWorldType() const=0;
00107 
00108                 virtual void    clearForces() = 0;
00109 
00111                 void setInternalTickCallback(btInternalTickCallback cb, void* worldUserInfo=0,bool isPreTick=false) 
00112                 { 
00113                         if (isPreTick)
00114                         {
00115                                 m_internalPreTickCallback = cb;
00116                         } else
00117                         {
00118                                 m_internalTickCallback = cb; 
00119                         }
00120                         m_worldUserInfo = worldUserInfo;
00121                 }
00122 
00123                 void    setWorldUserInfo(void* worldUserInfo)
00124                 {
00125                         m_worldUserInfo = worldUserInfo;
00126                 }
00127 
00128                 void*   getWorldUserInfo() const
00129                 {
00130                         return m_worldUserInfo;
00131                 }
00132 
00133                 btContactSolverInfo& getSolverInfo()
00134                 {
00135                         return m_solverInfo;
00136                 }
00137 
00138                 const btContactSolverInfo& getSolverInfo() const
00139                 {
00140                         return m_solverInfo;
00141                 }
00142 
00143 
00145                 virtual void    addVehicle(btActionInterface* vehicle) {(void)vehicle;}
00147                 virtual void    removeVehicle(btActionInterface* vehicle) {(void)vehicle;}
00149                 virtual void    addCharacter(btActionInterface* character) {(void)character;}
00151                 virtual void    removeCharacter(btActionInterface* character) {(void)character;}
00152 
00153 
00154 };
